name: Trong
description:
"Do you think normal Pong is too dull? Have the intuitive controls of Pong machines always bugged you?
This is where Trong comes in.
Trong is a Pong variant, that keeps your brain busy by changing controls every time you hit the ball. The control schemes range from simple directions through button mashing to complex sequence input.
And if playing against your friends is too easy, you can battle against the wall for score and try to reach the top spot in the leaderboard.
So, what are you waiting for? Download now, grab a controller and challenge your flexibility."

- An advertisement never said

Trong is my first project made with Godot Engine, created for PongJam and requires controllers to play.
Only Xbox controller and Linux build have been tested so far.

Thanks to:

  • Hyohoo for making these great controller button sprites
  • Matt Lagrandeur for creating such nice-looking bit fonts
